ygData.subject: Re: Box of Akbar (Was RE: New Patch)
ygData.msgSnippet: I was joking to all those that took my slightly warped sense of humor in the wrong sense.  I know that Verant is trying to make this the best game possible and
ygData.messageBody:
I was joking to all those that took my slightly warped sense of humor in the
wrong sense. I know that Verant is trying to make this the best game possible
and think that none of their employees has the disrespect for their porduct,
their customers, or their fellow employees that is shown in that post. And I
think they are doing a great job!

I was just blowing off a little stress in a fun, creative way. I appologize if
it came off the wrong way.
